sentence.Network_en: Flowerbeds and tubs are banked with summer bedding plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 花坛和花盆里种满了夏令花草。

sentence.Network_en: All the bedding is made of simple, untreated cotton.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有床上用品全部用未经处理的天然棉花制成。

sentence.Network_en: This dried grass will make good bedding for the sheep.
sentence.Network_cn: 这干草可用作羊的好垫草.

entry.def: Bedding is sheets, blankets, and covers that are used on beds.

means.word_mean: 1. coverings that are used on a bed
2. material used to provide a bed for animals
